title: Aardman classics
creator_credit: David Sproxton, Steve Box, Peter Lord, Nick Park and Aardman Animations
brief_description: Compilation of early Aardman short works, ranging from 1978-1999. Aardman, the animation studio specialising in claymation, are renowned for their humour, especially in relation to the portrayal of animals. Highlights here include “Pib and Pog” and “My baby just cares for me”.
creator_credit_for_label: David Sproxton, Steve Box, Peter Lord, Nick Park and Aardman Animations
